column5: Hi all, Me and my girlfriend is thinking about going ice fishing for a weekend, so I am looking for some suggestions on where to go. Not looking for Simcoe, there we can go over a day. We live in Toronto and can drive 5 hours to get some good place. Wish list: * decent room * Cabins on the ice * possibility to rent snowmobile * fishing for Lake trout, white fish, Walleye Many thanks in advance.
...no longer rents any ice huts, unless they bought some new ones this year. Sold them all in 2010

Yah.. I thought it was a dumb business move, but hey I didn't buy the place so I don't get a say in it!  Always Loon Lodge in the hub or similar if you wanted to do Temagami or some places on Nippising as well.

Give Everett a call at Everetts Northern Excursions  (705) 729-2881 Theres walleye pike whitefish and Lakers once they open. Nice Clean On Ice bungalows or a nice cabin on the shore if thats the way you want to go.Thats on Restoule about 4 hrs from TO
Just talked to my buddy who went this weekend They laid a beating on walleye whitefish and lakers with one pike
Nipissing has no Lakers. Whiteys are a challenge.
